 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּ֫חַשׁ‎</span> **noun masculine** <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ta—aš***</u></abbr>, ***a kind of leather or skin, and perhaps the animal yielding it*** (probably the ***dugong***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dolphin***, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>1500</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di-Ry]]<sup>[[Exod.25.5|Exod 25:5]]</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB BADGER</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ta—šu***</u></abbr> ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Baer Ezech. xvi</sup>), for which [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Proi. 77 ff.; HWB 705</sup> conjecture meaning ***sheep(skin)***; [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>Egyptiaca 1 ff.</sup> compare Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***¾µ´***</u></abbr>, ***leather***; see summary of views M'Lean-Shiply<sup>Ency. Bib. BADGERS' SKINS</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Num.4.6|Num 4:6]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחַשׁ‎</span> v[[Num.4.8|Num 4:8]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחָשִׁים‎</span> [[Exod.25.5|Exod 25:5]] +; — leather used for (woman's) sandals [[Ezek.16.10|Ezek 16:10]] elsewhere for cover of tabernacle [[Num.4.25|Num 4:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺר ת‎</span> v[[Num.4.6|Num 4:6]] v[[Num.4.8|Num 4:8]] v[[Num.4.10|Num 4:10]] v[[Num.4.11|Num 4:11]] v[[Num.4.12|Num 4:12]] v[[Num.4.14|Num 4:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרֹת (הַ)תְּחָשִׁים‎</span> [[Exod.25.5|Exod 25:5]]; [[Exod.26.14|Exod 26:14]]; [[Exod.35.7|Exod 35:7]]; [[Exod.35.23|Exod 35:23]]; [[Exod.36.19|Exod 36:19]]; [[Exod.39.34|Exod 39:34]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]).
